videoSnippet.title: Nezhmetdinov VS Tal || What Happens When Two Magicians Meet?
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator “I am both sad and pleased that in his last tournament, Rashid Gibiatovich came to my home in Latvia. He did not take first place, but the prize for beauty, as always, he took with him. Players die, tournaments are forgotten, but the works of great artists are left behind them to live on forever.” Mikhail Tal

Rashid Gibiatovich Nezhmetdinov vs Mikhail Tal
"Tartar Sauce"
USSR Championship 1961b (1961), Baku URS
Sicilian Defense: Najdorf. Scheveningen Variation (B84)

1. e4 c5 2. Nf3 d6 3. d4 cd4 4. Nd4 Nf6 5. Nc3 e6 6. Be2 Nbd7 7. O-O a6 8. f4 Qc7 9. g4 b5 10. a3 Bb7 11. Bf3 Nc5 12. Qe2 e5 13. Nf5 g6 14. fe5 de5 15. Nh6 Ne6 16. Bg2 Bg7 17. Rf6 Bf6 18. Nd5 Qd8 19. Qf2 Nf4 20. Bf4 ef4 21. e5 Be5 22. Re1 f6 23. Nf6 Qf6 24. Qd4 Kf8 25. Re5 Qd8 26. Rf5 gf5 27. Qh8 Ke7 28. Qg7 Ke6 29. gf5

judgment.name: Inaccuracy
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Ke8 was best.
